statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT product_id, quantity, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT product_name, quantity, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point < 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' AND last_updated < '2021-02-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_level
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM inventory_level ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_reports WHERE available_stock > 0
SELECT report_date, available_stock, reorder_needed FROM stock_reports WHERE reorder_needed = TRUE
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_level WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_level WHERE current_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_reports WHERE available_stock > 0 AND reorder_needed = TRUE ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT product_id, available_stock, reorder_needed FROM stock_reports WHERE available_stock < 10 ORDER BY available_stock DESC

SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_point, available_stock FROM inventory_level INNER JOIN stock_reports ON inventory_level.product_id = stock_reports.product_id WHERE current_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY current_stock DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, available_stock, reorder_needed FROM stock_reports WHERE available_stock BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY available_stock ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < reorder_point;
SELECT * FROM StockAvailability ORDER BY location ASC, available_quantity DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE stock_status = 'low';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, name ASC;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE reorder_point > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 100 OR reorder_point < 20 ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT i.product_id, i.name, s.location, s.available_quantity FROM Inventory i INNER JOIN StockAvailability s ON i.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY i.name ASC;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_name, r.report_date, s.location FROM Reports r LEFT JOIN StockAvailability s ON r.report_id = s.stock_id ORDER BY r.report_date DESC, r.report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, last_updated FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM Inventory JOIN ReorderPoint ON Inventory.product_id = ReorderPoint.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < reorder_point
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT s.product_id, s.current_quantity, r.reorder_point FROM StockStatus s JOIN ReorderPoint r ON s.product_id = r.product_id
SELECT i.product_name, i.quantity, s.current_quantity FROM Inventory i JOIN StockStatus s ON i.product_id = s.product_id WHERE i.quantity > s.current_quantity
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, item_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_type, generated_by, generated_at FROM reports WHERE generated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC, item_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < reorder_point OR reorder_point IS NULL;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id WHERE orders.quantity > 50 ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
